question: The annual Flamingo Festival is going to be held at Pulicat Lake in January. Where is Pulicat Lake?
explanation: Pulicat Lake is the second-largest brackish water system in India after Odishaâ€™s Chilika Lake. It is located at the border of Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu with about 96% of it in Andhra Pradesh and 4% in Tamil Nadu. About 75 aquatic and terrestrial bird species visit the sanctuary each year.
